info.title: Instructure Canvas Appointment Groups API
info.description: Canvas LMS includes a REST API for accessing and modifying data externally from the main application, in your own programs and scripts.

parameters.name: context_codes[]
parameters.description: Array of context codes used to limit returned results.

parameters.name: include[]
parameters.description: Array of additional information to include.nu201cappointmentsu201dnncalendar event time slots for this appointment groupnu201cchild_eventsu201dnnreservations of those time slotsnu201cparticipant_countu201dnnnumber of reservationsnu201creserved_timesu201dnnthe event id, start time and end time of reservations the current user hasnmade)nnn        n        n          Allowed values: appointments, child_events, participant_count, reserved_times

parameters.name: include_past_appointments
parameters.description: Defaults to false. If true, includes past appointment groups

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Defaults to u201creservableu201dnn        n        n          Allowed values: reservable, manageable

parameters.name: appointment_group[context_codes][]
parameters.description: Array of context codes (courses, e.g. course_1) this group should be linkednto (1 or more). Users in the course(s) with appropriate permissions will benable to sign up for this appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[description]
parameters.description: Longer text description of the appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[location_address]
parameters.description: Location address.

parameters.name: appointment_group[location_name]
parameters.description: Location name of the appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[max_appointments_per_participant]
parameters.description: Maximum number of time slots a user may register for.

parameters.name: appointment_group[min_appointments_per_participant]
parameters.description: Minimum number of time slots a user must register for. If not set, users donnot need to sign up for any time slots.

parameters.name: appointment_group[new_appointments][X][]
parameters.description: Nested array of start time/end time pairs indicating time slots for thisnappointment group. Refer to the example request.

parameters.name: appointment_group[participants_per_appointment]
parameters.description: Maximum number of participants that may register for each time slot.nDefaults to null (no limit).

parameters.name: appointment_group[participant_visibility]
parameters.description: u201cprivateu201dnnparticipants cannot see who has signed up for a particular time slotnu201cprotectedu201dnnparticipants can see who has signed up.  Defaults to u201cprivateu201d.nnn        n        n          Allowed values: private, protected

parameters.name: appointment_group[publish]
parameters.description: Indicates whether this appointment group should be published (i.e. madenavailable for signup). Once published, an appointment group cannot benunpublished. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: appointment_group[sub_context_codes][]
parameters.description: Array of sub context codes (course sections or a single group category)nthis group should be linked to. Used to limit the appointment group tonparticular sections. If a group category is specified, students will signnup in groups and the participant_type will be u201cGroupu201d instead of u201cUseru201d.

parameters.name: appointment_group[title]
parameters.description: Short title for the appointment group.

parameters.name: cancel_reason
parameters.description: Reason for deleting/canceling the appointment group.

parameters.name: include[]
parameters.description: Array of additional information to include. Ssee include[] argument ofnu201cList appointment groupsu201d action.nu201cchild_eventsu201dnnreservations of time slots time slotsnu201cappointmentsu201dnnwill always be returnednnn        n        n          Allowed values: child_events, appointments

parameters.name: appointment_group[context_codes][]
parameters.description: Array of context codes (courses, e.g. course_1) this group should be linkednto (1 or more). Users in the course(s) with appropriate permissions will benable to sign up for this appointment group.

parameters.description: Longer text description of the appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[new_appointments][X][]
parameters.description: Nested array of start time/end time pairs indicating time slots for thisnappointment group. Refer to the example request.

parameters.name: appointment_group[participants_per_appointment]
parameters.description: Maximum number of participants that may register for each time slot.nDefaults to null (no limit).

parameters.name: appointment_group[participant_visibility]
parameters.description: u201cprivateu201dnnparticipants cannot see who has signed up for a particular time slotnu201cprotectedu201dnnparticipants can see who has signed up. Defaults to u201cprivateu201d.nnn        n        n          Allowed values: private, protected

parameters.name: appointment_group[publish]
parameters.description: Indicates whether this appointment group should be published (i.e. madenavailable for signup). Once published, an appointment group cannot benunpublished. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: appointment_group[sub_context_codes][]
parameters.description: Array of sub context codes (course sections or a single group category)nthis group should be linked to. Used to limit the appointment group tonparticular sections. If a group category is specified, students will signnup in groups and the participant_type will be u201cGroupu201d instead of u201cUseru201d.

parameters.name: appointment_group[title]
parameters.description: Short title for the appointment group.

parameters.name: registration_status
parameters.description: Limits results to the a given participation status, defaults to u201callu201dnn        n        n          Allowed values: all, registered, registered

parameters.description: Limits results to the a given participation status, defaults to u201callu201dnn        n        n          Allowed values: all, registered, registered
